Profile Summary.Name: Harshad Bankar
Profile Summary.Summary: Pursuing a B-Tech in Information Technology at Vishwakarma Institute of Information Technology, with a CGPA of 8.65. Developed skills in AWS, Cybersecurity and has a keen interest in DevOps, software development, and cloud engineering. Participated in hackathons, showcasing problem-solving skills and team collaboration.

Project Work.Title: Travel Management System
Project Work.Description: Developed using C++ OOP concepts, allows users to book hotels and cabs and also provide the functionality to print bills. This system streamlines the booking process and ensures accurate billing for users.

Project Work.Title: DevOps Project
Project Work.Description: Deployed and hosted a highly available three-tier architecture application using GitHub, Jenkins, Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, EKS, and EC2.

Project Work.Title: Smart Salon
Project Work.Description: Developed a mobile application using Flutter and Firebase for managing a salon. It allows users to book and schedule appointments and handle various salon management tasks efficiently.

Project Work.Title: WordPress
Project Work.Description: Deployed and hosted a highly-available WordPress application using EC2, RDS, Route 53, ASG, and VPC.

K P Jadhav Junior College, Ahmednagar
